message: I'll take the lion's share since the value of the money decreases for both of us over time. It's in your best interest to accept now.
Alice, I understand the time pressure, but your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable. This is a much fairer split, and it's in both our interests to settle now.
Bob, time is money, literally! This offer still heavily favors you considering the inflation. Take it before it depreciates further.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. My offers have been more than fair considering the inflation. I'm standing firm on this.  Accept this offer, or we both risk losing out significantly.
